Summary: Heard jet like sound looked up saw it travle left to right looked as if it just came through the atmisfear leaving a light trial going toward Washington Captial .
divs: Sighting Details I was going to the store for my mother @ about 7pm on southern ave. when i heard jet like sound. I looked up to see a dark grayish egg like object moving kinda quietly through the air. It looked like aburnet bricket from a BBQ flying through the air, leaving a trial but its shap was that of a foot ball a little fatter inthe middel. Their was a jet sound but not as loud an a after sound, the swishing of the air after it pased over head.I could see the burn on the object the little red hot spots in the frount a lessor amount toward the back. Their was no lights,windos or anything that I could say some one could look out of, or running lights for safty. It scared me so bade I ran back home as fast as I could . I have never saw anything close or near like it,but I know what something sounds like moveing through the air, I live right near andrews airforce base,an have ben to lot of air showes up front an pearsonal. So I do no what the after sound sounds like after the jets ingens sound has stopped an the swashing sound of the air makes after the object has passed by.
trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Washington
There were no other sightings in Washington on or around September 15th 1963
